message: Let's split it 50/50 to start. Your turn!
You started high, I'll meet you in the middle!
You're getting closer to meeting me in the middle, but I'm not budging much more!
I'm not budging much, but I'll give you a bit more
You're getting closer, but I'm not giving up yet!
I'm not giving up either, let's meet in the middle now
Inflation is eating away at the value of the money, let's take advantage of it!
You're trying to take advantage of inflation, but I'm not falling for it!
Inflation is eating away at the value, I'm taking a bigger share while I can!
I'm not going to let you take advantage of the inflation, I'm making a final push!
This is my final offer, take it or leave it!
No more negotiations, this is my final offer, take it or we both get nothing!
